content:
Keep up with the best gear and deals on the web by signing up for the 9to5Toys Newsletter. Also, be sure to check us out on: Twitter, RSS Feed, Facebook, Google+ and Safari push notifications.

TODAY’S CAN’T MISS DEALS:

Reddit’s official Android app now launched w/ three months of free Reddit Gold

Add Bluetooth to nearly any speaker w/ the Mpow Streambot Mini for $14 Prime shipped

Google Nexus 5X 16GB now just $230 shipped (Reg. $349)

Green Deals: Philips hue LED Starter Bundle w/ HomeKit Bridge $170 (Reg. $200), more

Beats Solo2 Wired On-Ear Headphones (multiple colors) $90 shipped (Orig. $200), more

MORE NEW GEAR FROM TODAY:

Audio-Technica’s best selling ATH-M50x studio headphones + FiiO A3 amp $130 shipped ($180+ value)

  • Brothers A Tale of Two Sons iOS puzzle-adventure game gets its first price drop: $2 (Reg. $5)
  • Transistor action RPG for iOS matching its lowest price ever: $3 (Reg. $10)
  • App Store Free App of the Week: CHOMP interactive storybook goes free
  • Apple offers Day One 2 iOS journal app for free ($10 value)
  • Apple Milanese Loop knockoff for a tenth of the price ($16 Prime shipped)
  • Apple Watch 42mm Space Gray Milanese Loop Band + Aluminum Dock: $27 Prime shipped

PNY 480GB 2.5-inch Internal Solid State Drive: $100 shipped (Orig. $150) wp.me/p1xTlR-PQv https://t.co/2rDIRZxTfG

9to5Toys (@9to5toys) April 07, 2016

author: Stephen Hall
title: 3 months of free Reddit Gold w/ app download, Mpow Streambot Mini $14, more
